field.label: Public Client ID
field.tooltip: This can be obtained by visiting the Account section of the Nextopia control panel, and looking for "Public Client ID." It will look something like "1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef" and is 32 characters long.

field.label: Nextopia Ajax version
field.tooltip: Default value should work fine for this, but if this doesn't work, contact nextopia support.

field.label: Enabled
field.tooltip: Set this to "No" to use the default Magento search. Set this to "Yes" when you wish to make Nextopia Search live.

field.label: Demo mode
field.tooltip: When this is set to "Yes", it will enable /nsearch url but will not default to it. It will demonstrate our search, without enabling it on the site. This setting is ignored when the module is enabled

field.label: Navigation enabled
field.tooltip: When this is set to "Yes", it takes over navigation to use nextopia NAV product and will replace your category pages

field.label: Content div id
field.tooltip: This setting is to override default content id of 'nxt-content' with whatever id you want (in case one is using this id).

field.label: Content div id
field.tooltip: This setting is to override default content id of 'nxt-refine' with whatever id you want (in case one is using this id).

field.label: Loading Content
field.tooltip: This will be shown as the client waits for the content to load.

field.label: Tracking Personas Activities Enabled
field.tooltip: Information gathered about an individual user, based on their preference for certain attributes (ie. gender) each session. our powerful algorithm uses this information to then display the most relevant results for each individual user. Personas affects each user's search results, autocomplete suggestions and product recommendations per session. For more informations, contact us

field.label: Nextopia cron enabled
field.tooltip: This setting is to enable the Nextopia Cron Job

field.label: Auth username
field.tooltip: Username for Export CSV File on /nsearch/exporter/index/store_id/{ID}

field.label: Auth password
field.tooltip: Password for Export CSV File on /nsearch/exporter/index/store_id/{ID}

field.label: Label on search result page
field.tooltip: The default text is {Search results for "keyword"}
